reviewText: Tierras de Agua Dulce is a beautiful and valuable documentary. Gorgeously filmed, it makes an ecological warning to the preservation of Venezuelan's freshwater lands, presenting us with its beauty and richness in breathtaking shots. Filmed on the banks of the Orinoco river. Enjoyable, relevant and worthy.
Beautiful and informative.  This film is an excellent tool for explaining the importance of wetlands to young minds.  A valuable addition to any teacher's library.

This is a beautiful documentary film. I went deeply impressed with the majestic beauty of the wonderful Venezuelan wetlands: scenery of large water reserves decorated with forests, parrots, alligators, fish, birds and many more creatures of wonder depicting a unique biodiversity. We all know the water value for present and future generation. This stunning film succeeds to express it just by combining interviews with local people, music and pictures.
Worth watching for sure.
Loved it...a great way to communicate the story of freshwater lands-provides an excellent footage of local knowlege and their interaction with local environment..
Loved it! Amazing scenery! A great way to discover an  unknown land and it's people. Water's magic enhanced by ecuatorial light and a sensitive insight

Excellent documentary on what seems to be a not so well known yet very important subject.  Beautiful photography, insightful interviews with the locals and information about Venezuela and its freshwater lands makes this a must-see documentary for venezuelans and other nationalities alike.

Hay que cononcer nuestra tierra, Venezuela un Pais con muchos recursos naturales y con gente intersada en mostrar lo valioso de estos recursos y lo mucho que debemos cuiadarlo... Venezuela un pais que debe entender que debemos protegerla para las generaciones futuras del mundo ... muy recomendada...

Este es uno de los documentales mas completos y actuales acerca del agua. Se los recomiendo ampliamente, va a darles una nueva visin acerca de la importancia del agua dulce en el mundo que en estos momentos cruciales del planeta tierra es fundamental comprender.

Excelente trabajo cinematografico. Bella Fotografia que te mantiene gracias a la edicion pegado a la pantalla. Tremendo tema.
Vale la pena tenerlo en tu DVDteca
